ValidationRule.description: Users cannot add Emrays AI subscription and Emrays AI one-off products to New Business or Upsell Opportunities.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), ISNEW(), Quantity >0, OR( TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "New Business-Enterprise Cloud", TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "Existing Business-Upsell", TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "New Business - Expansion Portal" ), OR( Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000ShP6AAK', Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000ShPBAA0' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot add Emrays AI subscription and Emrays AI one-off products to New business or Upsell opportunities.
